thread.title: George Lopez Comes Under Fire For Cursing Out a Woman Offended By His Joke
thread.title_full: George Lopez Comes Under Fire For Cursing Out a Woman Offended By His Joke

author: Kyle Hodge
title: George Lopez Comes Under Fire For Cursing Out a Woman Offended By His Joke
text:
George Lopez Comes Under Fire For Cursing Out a Woman Offended By His Joke This situation went from 0 to 100 real quick. by Kyle Hodge 2h ago 
George Lopez went 0-100 on a female audience member during a show after she reacted negatively toward one of his jokes. While performing a stand up gig at the Celebrity Theatre in Phoenix, the Mexican-American comedian joked, “there are only 2 rules in the Latino family — don’t marry somebody black and don’t park in front of our house.” After the joke, the woman stood up showing her dipleasure with the joke, which caught the comedian’s attention. In a clip of the incident obtained by TMZ , Lopez is seen responding to the woman’s gesture by calling her a “b*tch” and giving her an ultimatum, “Sit your f**king ass down or get the f**k out.”
